I can't speak on the food because I've never had it. The drinks are good, no problems there. The staff is cool too. However, be careful having drinks and/or hookah with the staff after midnight. There's no POS system and your tab is hand written which leaves room for all kinds of errors and "mistakes". If you're not paying attention they will tack on additional drinks to your tab. It's very shameless of this establishment to do this but it does happen, depending on who's working I guess.

How does this work as $goes
Delicious

We were shamelessly overcharged. We got 4 cubetazos of corona, 1 hookah, and a plate of fried chicken with fries. The beer was $25 a set, the hookah $30, and the food $12... how did they end up charging us $200??? Included an extra plate of food that we didn't ask for and never consumed. They started pricing the beer sets to $30 without any notice after the 1st set. When we complained about the overcharges, the waitress shamelessly added a 5th set of beer in front of us.

We paid but, of course, didn't leave a single penny on tip and for sure will never stop by this place.
The food was super Tasty... and the server were super nice. I really want to say thank you for such a good experience eating there.

their food is extremely good, Dominican delicacy. Best chicharr√≥n de pollo & churrasco.

Comida pesima guardan el pollo en la nevera por una semana y luego lo sacan lo calientan y te lo venden como pollo al horno fresco!!! Cochinaa!! Deverian cerrar ese local!!! Con razon la calificacion tan pesima que tiene!

Had the pleasure of finding tis GEM of a spot in Bronx near Hunts point.  SURPRISE SURPRISE..yes, there is a great restaurant for Spanish food there an there is ample parking.  I cannot stop dreaming about their black beans,  Simple yes, but addictive! The restaurant has plenty of space, and great service.  I sat at the bar, and I watched patron after patron enjoy themselves like they were family.  And that is when it clicked, the owner makes everyone FEEL like they are her family and you are sitting at her table.  The best is the food.  ABSOLUTELY the recipes you remember as a child being the best.  Well you don't have to dream anymore of childhood favorites.  At Milly's Corner, she welcomes you into her home and the feast is like no other.  She also supports her community  so keep this place on your favorites list and keep her open!!!!!!

Very racist.They did not want to let me in because I wasnt their kind.I was fine with that until the owner let a Spanish guy in off the street who came 20 minutes after me and told the bouncer in Spanish not to let me in!! I was embarrassed and humiliated....They slammed the door in my face!!
Ive spent money there in the past but they wont see another dime from me !!!
